title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Roletto, Italy
content:
Photo submitted by Bertello Paolo of Monte Muretto in Roletto near Turin, Italy. We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here. *Please note that public spaces and parks may have […]
